text: Fantastic food and amazing service! The staff were very friendly, and the ambiance was perfect. Highly recommend this place!
Great flavors and authentic dishes. The butter chicken was delicious. Will come back for sure!
Good food but the service was a bit slow. Overall a pleasant experience.
Lovely ambiance and tasty food. The naan was fresh and soft. Highly recommend the samosas.
Decent place with good vegetarian options. Could improve on presentation.
Absolutely loved the flavors and the friendly staff. A must-visit for Indian cuisine lovers!
Good value for money. Portions were generous and the spices were balanced well.
Nice atmosphere and excellent service. Loved the paneer tikka.
One of the best Indian restaurants in town! Highly recommend the biryani.
Food was okay but a bit salty for my taste. Friendly staff though.
Good food and quick service. The garlic naan was especially tasty.
Lovely flavors and excellent customer care. The desserts were a perfect finish.
Perfect place for family dinners. The staff is very attentive and the food is always fresh.
Good taste and decent prices. Would love to see more vegan options.
Authentic flavors and nice ambiance. The service staff was very courteous.
